They’re really leaning into it! Yep, totally making the most of it! They’ve cried about it and then just accepted it. People can get used to anything, even the worst stuff! 

He fell silent, lost in thought. 

“What if I’m wrong?” he suddenly shouted after a moment. “What if people aren’t actually terrible? I mean, all of humanity—maybe it’s just our biases, just fake fears. Maybe there are no real limits and everything is as it should be.” 🤔

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The narrator reflects on the nature of humanity, questioning whether the perception of man as a scoundrel is merely a prejudice.
